name: Jareg

skills.name: Rending Claws
skills.description: Attacks 1 enemy. Has an 35% chance of placing a 50% [Decrease ATK] debuff for 2 turns.

effects.notes: Single-hit ATK-scaling damage. Base multiplier 6.7 ATK. Books increase damage by 25% total.
35% base chance, 60% fully booked (books add +25% total chance). Critical debuff for Clan Boss survivability.

skills.book_value: HIGH - Books increase Decrease ATK chance from 35% → 60% (+25%). Essential for consistent debuff uptime in Clan Boss.
skills.notes: Primary Decrease ATK application. Fully booked = 60% chance per hit. Pair with Sniper mastery for 65% total chance. Critical for reducing Clan Boss damage output.

skills.name: Pack Leader (Cooldown: 5 turns)
skills.description: Places a 50% [Ally Protection] and a 60% [Increase DEF] buff on all allies for 2 turns.

effects.notes: 50% Ally Protection - Transfers 50% of damage from allies to Jareg. Stacks with Increase DEF to reduce effective damage taken before transfer.
60% Increase DEF - Reduces incoming damage before Ally Protection transfer. Synergizes perfectly with Ally Protection to maximize team survivability.

skills.book_value: MEDIUM - Books reduce cooldown from 5 → 4 turns. Improves buff uptime for Clan Boss and dungeons.
skills.notes: Core survivability skill. Increase DEF applied BEFORE Ally Protection transfer = effective damage reduction. Jareg must have high HP/DEF to tank transferred damage. Works perfectly with Lifesteal/Immortal sets + Warmaster proc heals.

skills.name: Sheltering Scales
skills.description: Places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on an ally for 1 turn whenever an ally loses 20% of their MAX HP in one hit.

effects.notes: Passive heal trigger. Activates when any ally takes 20%+ MAX HP damage in single hit. Provides emergency sustain in Faction Wars (boss ignores DEF) and vs hard-hitting content.

skills.book_value: N/A - Passive skill cannot be booked.
skills.notes: Lifesaver in Faction Wars Stage 21 where boss ignores all defense. Triggers automatically on big hits. Synergizes with Healing Savior + Lore of Steel masteries to boost heal value. Does NOT require ACC to apply (passive buff, not debuff).

forms.aura: Increases Ally HP in all battles by 33%.
forms.comments: Form-specific notes, edge cases, or user/community feedback.

stat_priorities: 250+ ACC (land Decrease ATK on Clan Boss 300 RES)
171-191 SPD (1:1 Clan Boss tune) OR 220+ SPD (dungeons)

stat_priority_recommendations.clan_boss: 250+ ACC, 171-191 SPD (1:1 tune), 35k+ HP, 2500+ DEF, 200+ RES. Decrease ATK must land consistently (60% booked + 65% with Sniper mastery).
stat_priority_recommendations.dungeons: 220+ SPD, 200+ ACC, 40k+ HP, 3000+ DEF. Ally Protection + Inc DEF keeps squishy nukers alive through waves.
stat_priority_recommendations.arena: 260+ SPD, HP%/DEF% focus. Limited Arena use - Decrease ATK is strong but lacks burst damage/control.
stat_priority_recommendations.doom_tower: 220+ SPD, 250+ ACC, 40k+ HP, 3000+ DEF. Decrease ATK helps vs boss nukes, but limited vs waves.
stat_priority_recommendations.faction_wars: 220+ SPD, 200+ ACC, 45k+ HP, 3000+ DEF. HP aura 33% + Passive heal (Sheltering Scales) critical for Stage 21 boss (ignores DEF).

recommended_gear: Lifesteal + Speed (Clan Boss standard - Warmaster procs heal Jareg via Lifesteal)
Immortal + Perception (Alternative - permanent HP sustain + ACC for debuffs)
Speed + Accuracy (Dungeons/FW - fast cycling, reliable debuffs)
Stat Priority: HP% chest/gloves, SPD boots, ACC banner, HP/DEF ring/amulet

clan_boss: Offense Tree: Deadly Precision, Keen Strike, Life Drinker, Bring it Down, Methodical, Warmaster (MUST HAVE - Warmaster procs heal via Lifesteal set)

Support Tree: Steadfast, Lay on Hands (buffs heal stronger), Exalt in Death, Swarm Smiter, Healing Savior (boosts Continuous Heal from passive), Lore of Steel (HP/DEF from artifacts), Merciful Aid (heal allies below 50% HP), Lasting Gifts (extends buff duration - use cautiously, can throw off speed tune), Master Hexer (extends Decrease ATK debuff by 1 turn at 30% chance)
dungeons: Same as Clan Boss - Warmaster + Support masteries for sustain and buff extension
arena: Not recommended for Arena (lacks burst damage/control)
doom_tower: Same as Clan Boss - Warmaster + Support tree
faction_wars: Same as Clan Boss - Warmaster + Support tree. Healing Savior + Lore of Steel boost Sheltering Scales passive heal.
general: ALWAYS take Warmaster (Offense tree T6) - critical for Lifesteal set healing.
Support tree: Healing Savior, Lore of Steel, Merciful Aid, Master Hexer are all strong.

blessings: Faultless Defense (Tank role) - reduces damage taken when HP drops below threshold. Synergizes with Ally Protection.
Heavencast (Debuffer role) - boost Decrease ATK effectiveness or duration.

ai_quirks.ai_issue_description: AI prioritizes Pack Leader (Ally Protection + Inc DEF) on cooldown. Will use A1 (Decrease ATK) otherwise. Good AI for Clan Boss auto.

cheese_strategy.cheese_type: Ally Protection swap (with Skullcrusher or second Ally Protection champion)
cheese_strategy.cheese_mechanic_info: CHEESE COMP: Jareg + Skullcrusher (or Krisk/Martyr). Swap Ally Protection buffs to keep both protectors alive while rest of team survives. This outperformed many Legendary combos for Clan Boss pre-2023 meta. Requires speed tuning so Ally Protection buffs don't overlap wastefully.

mechanics_advisory: Jareg is a BUDGET LEGENDARY for Clan Boss. Epic rarity but Legendary performance in early-mid game UNM Clan Boss. Core strengths: (1) Decrease ATK 50% on A1 (60% booked) reduces boss damage significantly, (2) Ally Protection + Inc DEF combo (Pack Leader) lets squishy DPS survive, (3) Passive Continuous Heal (Sheltering Scales) provides emergency sustain when allies take 20%+ MAX HP hits, (4) HP aura 33% (all battles) boosts team survivability everywhere. WEAKNESS: Low base SPD (96) makes 2:1 Clan Boss tune very difficult (needs +167-184 SPD from gear). Best in 1:1 tune (171-191 SPD). Replace with Decrease ATK champions like Tayrel/Stag Knight/Sandlashed Survivor when roster matures. FACTION WARS MVP: HP aura + passive heal critical for Lizardmen Stage 21 (boss ignores DEF).

validation_metadata.ocr_notes: Base stats validated from Ayumilove (HP 23460, ATK 1057, DEF 1167, SPD 96). HellHades ratings: 9/10 Clan Boss, 5/10 Arena. Community consensus: Budget Legendary for early-mid game Clan Boss.

author: GitHub Copilot
comments: Jareg is one of the best Epic champions for early-mid game Clan Boss progression. His Decrease ATK debuff (A1) is critical for team survivability, and Pack Leader (A2) with Ally Protection + Inc DEF is a defensive powerhouse. The passive Continuous Heal (Sheltering Scales) provides emergency sustain in Faction Wars and vs hard-hitting bosses. HP aura 33% works in all battles (dungeons, FW, CB). LIMITATIONS: Low base SPD (96) makes 2:1 Clan Boss tune impractical (needs +167-184 SPD). Best in 1:1 tune (171-191 SPD). Not viable for Arena (no burst/control). Replace in late-game Clan Boss with stronger Decrease ATK champions (Tayrel, Stag Knight) or unkillable comps. FACTION WARS: MVP for Lizardmen - HP aura + passive heal essential for Stage 21 boss (ignores defense). Fully book A1 and A2 (7 tomes total). Run Warmaster + Lifesteal set for Clan Boss sustain.

update_notes.last_patch: Patch 9.20 (2025-11-07) - Completed full champion entry with skills, comprehensive content, ratings, and validation.
